contents.item: Be happy for things that work.

contents.item: The habit of happiness is achieved through the attitude of gratitude.

contents.item: Revolution starts within our own heart, not on the street
The number one joy indicator, the one thing that will predict whether someone feels joy in their life or not, is the practice of gratitude.
contents.owner: John O'Leary, On Fire: The 7 Choices to Ignite a Radically Inspired Life

contents.item: May your life be filled with more gratitude.
What had she have to wish for? Nothing but to grow more worthy of him whose intentions and judgment had been ever so superior to her own.
The beauty of existence is a passionate sacred-life.
contents.owner: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

contents.item: Be happy with what you have.
contents.owner: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

contents.item: Gratefulness leads to good health and happy life.
contents.owner: Lailah Gifty Akita, Think Great: Be Great!

contents.item: Joy is the simplest form of gratitude.
The most beautiful moments in life are moments when you are expressing your joy, not when you are seeking it.
There is more reason to say grace before beginning a book than there is to say it before beginning to dine.
No matter what, if you have the strength of life, it is enough to be thankful.
The glory of life is strength of existence.

Gratitude pours forth continually, as if the unexpected had just happened—the gratitude of a convalescent—for convalescence was unexpected…. The rejoicing of strength that is returning, of a reawakened faith in a tomorrow and the day after tomorrow, of a sudden sense and anticipation of a future, of impending adventures, of seas that are open again.
Life can only be live with grace and gratitude.
